channel.title: Just wana know.if this is against the rules
channel.description: before you start to cuse me out i just wana say. i read the rules. so dont go says "aw screw you! you nub faget!" cause i dont feel like reading it again. is it against the rules to advertise for a client share? for example: i have a client.but i cant port forward. i need someone to help me with my server anway. i also need someone to port forward. 1.is this against the rules. 2.can someone else port forward for me? before you answer these questions label them if the answer is about P.F (port forwarding.)put in '2.'if its about the rules put '1.' thanks for reading if you did...

item.title: Just wana know.if this is against the rules
item.dc:creator: @soul_extange soul extange
item.description:
@soul_extange wrote:

[quote=“ninja nub, post:4, topic:184772”]No, someone can’t portforward for you.

and
stop
typing
like
this.
Thanks ;)[/quote]im
not
talking
like
this.
first of all i type like this so it looks nice.

[quote=“ninja nub, post:6, topic:184772”]Shogun gtfo.

NEVER give your IP address away to ANYONE. They could easily take control of your computer.[/quote]
i have a freind who i’ve known for 10 years.
plus im bigger then him.

Read full topic

item.title: Just wana know.if this is against the rules
item.dc:creator: @soul_extange soul extange
item.description:
@soul_extange wrote:

before you start to cuse me out i just wana say.
i read the rules.
so dont go says “aw screw you!
you nub faget!”
cause i dont feel like reading it again.
is it against the rules to advertise for a client share?
for example:
i have a client.but i cant port forward.
i need someone to help me with my server anway.
i also need someone to port forward.
1.is this against the rules.
2.can someone else port forward for me?
before you answer these questions label them if the answer is about P.F
(port forwarding.)put in '2.'if its about the rules put ‘1.’
thanks for reading if you did…
